Texts.Chs: 我成功地把我找到的物品进行了组合，哈哈，我能轻松地在墙壁上飞来飞去啦！
Texts.Eng: ...and by properly combining these artifacts, you'll be able to grapple with amazing ease and throw yourself long distances:

Texts.Chs: 一个远古神器，一个未知能量核心还有一份远古残卷。我知道在这种恐怖的氛围要要一字不差地念对咒文是非常困难的，但千万别紧张，一旦念错，命就没了。
Texts.Eng: 1 Elder Artifact, 1 Unknown Reactor and 3 Elder Fragments. Be sure to utter the prayer correctly. The gutteral language is difficult but accuracy is survival, in this case.
